name: The Sytopian Situation
description:
This game is a work in progress.

You: a peaceful small village dweller in a medieval age society. 
Her: a vengeful alien seductress with a compendium of knowledge about the universe. 
Them: Desperate to get her back.

From the maker of Miss Agatha's Palace comes a whole new adventure!  You must protect E-V927 from the forces of evil who seek her recapture.  E-V927 is a Voluption, a species bred for sex slavery by the Sytopians.  But she's not going back to that life, and you're going to help her.  From small town boy to galactic hero overnight, your universe just got a whole lot bigger.

The introduction is available now for this primarily text-based erotic adventure.  More is on the way.
